name: Crebase
text: Crebase has the highest defense of all ice-type pokemon. Do no confuse with HBase, Couchbase, MeshBase, Graphbase or KirbyBase.

name: Tokutek
text: Tokutek claim to improve MongoDB performance 20x. Unclear if this also mean lose 20x as many documents.

name: Adabas
text: ADABAS was NoSQL from time when there was no SQL. Technology now is own by Software AG. "Software AG: We're not sure what we do either."

name: Feebas
text: Feebas require Swift Swim to get marvel scale.

name: Azurill
text: Azurill's tail is large and bouncy. Azurill can be seen bouncing and playing on its big, rubbery tail. On sunny days they gather at the edge of water and splash about for fun.

name: Hadoop
text: Hadoop is distributed system for counting words.

name: Vulpix
text: Munchlax is a great counter to Vulpix, being able to take four Fire Blasts from the Life Orb set and hit back hard with Earthquake or STAB Return.

name: Hekaton
text: Refer to lock-free architecture for SQL Server 2014. no to be confuse with Magneton the levitating Pokémon.

name: Mukubird
text: Mukubird flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stay within a huge flock.

name: Summingbird
text: This Twitter technology combines streaming, MapReduce, Scalding, Scala and Storm. Potential users must prove they are hipster before allowed to download.

name: Akiban
text: Touted as SQL database with object structured storage, Akiban was recently acquired by another database vendor you never have heard of.

name: Arbok
text: Despite report to the contrary, Arbok no does evolve into Seviper.

name: Flink
text: Flink’s core is a streaming dataflow engine that provides data distribution, communication, and fault tolerance for distributed computations over data streams.

name: Impala
text: Impala is the open source, native analytic database for Apache Hadoop. Impala is shipped by Cloudera, MapR, Oracle, and Amazon.

name: Mahout
text: The Apache Mahout™ project's goal is to build an environment for quickly creating scalable performant machine learning applications.

name: Pangool
text: Pangool aims to simplify Hadoop development without loosing the performance and flexibility that the low-level Hadoop API provides.

name: Azkaban
text: Azkaban is a batch workflow job scheduler created at LinkedIn to run Hadoop jobs.

name: HBase
text: Apache HBase™ is the Hadoop database, a distributed, scalable, big data store.

name: Hive
text: The Apache Hive ™ data warehouse software facilitates querying and managing large datasets residing in distributed storage.

name: Spark
text: Apache Spark™ is a fast and general engine for large-scale data processing.

name: Storm
text: Apache Storm is a free and open source distributed realtime computation system.
